title: CWCAGScanner - Advanced Accessibility Testing Platform
description: Effortless accessibility compliance with automated WCAG scanning. Get instant, actionable reports covering WCAG 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 at all compliance levels with developer-friendly visual guides.

sections.heading: Effortless Accessibility, Real Compliance
sections.body:
Experience the next generation of WCAG site scanning. Our platform automatically tests your website for hundreds of accessibility barriers—covering WCAG 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 at every compliance level.

Get instant, actionable reports with prioritized issues and developer-friendly visual guides. Deep dive with regression tracking, disability simulators, expert manual audits, and seamless workflow integrations.

Designed for teams, agencies, and global brands, our accessibility platform grows with your site—from single-page scans to enterprise-wide monitoring.

sections.heading: Core Features
sections.body:
**Developer-Friendly Testing**
• Visual issue highlighting with precise code location markers
• Multiple solution options for each identified violation
• Copy-paste code snippets for quick fixes
• Integration with popular IDEs and development tools

**Comprehensive WCAG Coverage**
• Automated auditing for WCAG 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 guidelines
• Complete coverage of Levels A, AA, and AAA compliance
• Section 508 and international accessibility standards
• Regular updates for emerging accessibility requirements

**Multi-Level Analysis**
• Component-level testing for granular issue identification
• Page-level testing for holistic user experience assessment
• Site-wide scanning for enterprise applications
• Custom testing scenarios and user journey analysis

sections.heading: Advanced Testing Capabilities
sections.body:
**Color Contrast & Visual Analysis**
• Comprehensive color contrast checks with real-time validation
• On-page color selection tools for designers
• Pass/fail reporting with improvement suggestions
• Support for dynamic content and hover states

**Content & Media Validation**
• Alt text verification for all images and media
• Missing or incorrect description identification
• Video caption and transcript analysis
• Icon and decorative image classification

**Navigation & Interaction Testing**
• Keyboard navigation flow analysis
• Focus order verification and optimization suggestions
• Tab trap detection and resolution guidance
• Touch target size and spacing validation

**Form Accessibility**
• Label association verification for all form elements
• Error message accessibility and clarity testing
• Field validation and user guidance assessment
• Screen reader compatibility for complex forms

sections.heading: Enterprise Features
sections.body:
**Regression Tracking & Monitoring**
• Baseline establishment for accessibility debt tracking
• New violation detection with priority ranking
• Historical trend analysis and improvement metrics
• Team progress tracking and accountability tools

**Workflow Integration**
• CI/CD pipeline integration for automated testing
• CMS plugins for content editors and publishers
• Browser extensions for quick accessibility checks
• API access for custom workflow implementations

**Reporting & Collaboration**
• Interactive reports with filtering and search capabilities
• Export options (PDF, CSV, JSON) for stakeholder sharing
• Team collaboration tools with issue assignment
• Custom branding for client-facing reports

**Professional Services**
• Expert manual audit services for comprehensive compliance
• Partner network access for specialized remediation
• Training and consultation for accessibility best practices
• Regular scheduled scanning for continuous monitoring

sections.heading: Standards Compliance
sections.body:
**Supported Standards**
• Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, 2.1, 2.2
• Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) compliance
• Section 508 federal accessibility requirements
• European Accessibility Act (EAA) standards
• EN 301 549 technical specifications

**Compliance Levels**
• Level A: Basic accessibility features
• Level AA: Standard compliance for most organizations
• Level AAA: Enhanced accessibility for specialized needs
• Custom compliance profiles for specific industry requirements
